verses.verse: <S%G3588><s%> Now <S%G1161><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Having Been Born <S%G1080><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Bethlehem <S%G965><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Judea, <S%G2449><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The Days <S%G2250><s%> Of Herod <S%G2264><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King, <S%G935><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> Magi <S%G3097><s%> From <S%G575><s%> The East <S%G395><s%> Arrived <S%G3854><s%> At <S%G1519><s%> Jerusalem, <S%G2414><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> Is <S%G2076><s%> He Who <S%G3588><s%> Has Been Born <S%G5088><s%> King <S%G935><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Jews? <S%G2453><s%> For We <S%G1492><s%> Saw <S%G1063><s%> His <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Star <S%G792><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> East, <S%G395><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Are Come <S%G2064><s%> To Do Homage <S%G4352><s%> To Him. <S%G846><s%>

Having Heard <S%G191><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King <S%G935><s%> He Was Troubled, <S%G5015><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Jerusalem <S%G2414><s%> ' With <S%G3326><s%> Him. <S%G846><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Gathered Together <S%G4863><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Priests <S%G749><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Scribes <S%G1122><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> People, <S%G2992><s%> He Inquired <S%G4441><s%> ' Of <S%G3844><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> Where <S%G4226><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Should Be Born. <S%G1080><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> Said <S%G2036><s%> To Him, <S%G846><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Bethlehem <S%G965><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Judea : <S%G2449><s%> <S%G3779><s%> For Thus It <S%G1063><s%> Has Been Written <S%G1125><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophet, <S%G4396><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Thou, <S%G4771><s%> Bethlehem, <S%G965><s%> Land <S%G1093><s%> Of Judea, <S%G2448><s%> In No Wise <S%G3760><s%> Least <S%G1646><s%> Art <S%G1488><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Governors <S%G2232><s%> Of Judea, <S%G2448><s%> Out <S%G1537><s%> Of Thee <S%G4675><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> Shall Go Forth <S%G1831><s%> A Leader, <S%G2233><s%> Who <S%G3748><s%> Shall Shepherd <S%G4165><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G2992><s%> My People <S%G3450><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Herod, <S%G2264><s%> Secretly <S%G2977><s%> Having Called <S%G2564><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Magi, <S%G3097><s%> Inquired Accurately <S%G198><s%> ' Of <S%G3844><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Time <S%G5550><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Appearing <S%G5316><s%> Star. <S%G792><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Sent <S%G3992><s%> Them <S%G846><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> Bethlehem, <S%G965><s%> He Said, <S%G2036><s%> Having Gone, <S%G4198><s%> Accurately <S%G199><s%> Inquire <S%G1833><s%> For <S%G4012><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Little Child; <S%G3813><s%> <S%G1875><s%> And When <S%G1161><s%> Ye Shall Have Found Him <S%G2147><s%> Bring Word Back <S%G518><s%> To Me, <S%G3427><s%> That <S%G3704><s%> I Also <S%G2504><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> May Do Homage <S%G4352><s%> To Him. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And They <S%G1161><s%> Having Heard <S%G191><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> King, <S%G935><s%> Went Away; <S%G4198><s%> And <S%G2532><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Star, <S%G792><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> They Saw <S%G1492><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> East, <S%G395><s%> Went Before <S%G4254><s%> Them, <S%G846><s%> Until <S%G2193><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> It Stood <S%G2476><s%> Over <S%G1883><s%> Where <S%G3757><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Little Child. <S%G3813><s%>
<S%G1492><s%> And Having Seen <S%G1161><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Star, <S%G792><s%> They Rejoiced With <S%G5463><s%> Joy <S%G5479><s%> Great <S%G3173><s%> Exceedingly. <S%G4970><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> House, <S%G3614><s%> They Found <S%G2147><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Little Child <S%G3813><s%> With <S%G3326><s%> Mary <S%G3137><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3384><s%> His Mother, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Fallen Down <S%G4098><s%> Did Homage <S%G4352><s%> To Him : <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Opened <S%G455><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Treasures <S%G2344><s%> Their <S%G846><s%> They Offered <S%G4374><s%> To Him <S%G846><s%> Gifts; <S%G1435><s%> Gold <S%G5557><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Frankincense <S%G3030><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Myrrh. <S%G4666><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Been Divinely Instructed <S%G5537><s%> ' In <S%G2596><s%> A Dream <S%G3677><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> To Return <S%G344><s%> To <S%G4314><s%> Herod, <S%G2264><s%> ' By <S%G1223><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> Way <S%G3598><s%> They Withdrew <S%G402><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5561><s%> Their Own Country. <S%G846><s%>

<S%G402><s%> Now Having Withdrawn <S%G1161><s%> They, <S%G846><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> An Angel <S%G32><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> Appears <S%G5316><s%> ' In <S%G2596><s%> A Dream <S%G3677><s%> <S%G3588><s%> To Joseph, <S%G2501><s%>, Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Having Risen <S%G1453><s%> Take With Thee <S%G3880><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Little Child <S%G3813><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3384><s%> His Mother, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Flee <S%G5343><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Egypt, <S%G125><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Be <S%G2468><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> Until <S%G2193><s%> I 302 PRT Shall Tell 2036 V-2AAS-1S Thee; 4671 P-2DS Is About 3195 V-PAI-3S For 1063 CONJ Herod 2264 N-NSM To Seek 2212 V-PAN The 3588 T-ASN Little Child, 3813 N-ASN 3588 T-GSM To Destroy 622 V-AAN Him. 846 P-ASN

<S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Having Risen <S%G1453><s%> Took With Him <S%G3880><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Little Child <S%G3813><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3384><s%> His Mother <S%G846><s%> By Night, <S%G3571><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Withdrew <S%G402><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> Egypt, <S%G125><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Was <S%G2258><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> Until <S%G2193><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Death <S%G5054><s%> Of Herod : <S%G2264><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> Might Be Fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Spoken <S%G4483><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Lord <S%G2962><s%> Through <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophet, <S%G4396><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Out <S%G1537><s%> Of Egypt <S%G125><s%> Have I Called <S%G2564><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> My Son. <S%G3450><s%>

Then <S%G5119><s%> Herod, <S%G2264><s%> Having Seen <S%G1492><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> He Was Mocked <S%G1702><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Magi, <S%G3097><s%> Was Enraged <S%G2373><s%> Greatly, <S%G3029><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Having Sent <S%G649><s%> He Put To Death <S%G337><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Boys <S%G3816><s%> That Were <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Bethlehem <S%G965><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3725><s%> Its Borders, <S%G846><s%> From <S%G575><s%> Two Years Old <S%G1332><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Under, <S%G2736><s%> According To <S%G2596><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Time <S%G5550><s%> Which He Had <S%G3739><s%> Accurately Inquired <S%G198><s%> From <S%G3844><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Magi. <S%G3097><s%>
Then <S%G5119><s%> Was Fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Spoken <S%G4483><s%> By <S%G5259><s%> Jeremiah <S%G2408><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophet, <S%G4396><s%> Saying, <S%G3004><s%>

A Voice <S%G5456><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Ramah <S%G4471><s%> Was Heard, <S%G191><s%> Lamentation <S%G2355><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Weeping <S%G2805><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Mourning <S%G3602><s%> Great, <S%G4183><s%> Rachel <S%G4478><s%> Weeping For <S%G2799><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5043><s%> Her Children, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Not <S%G3756><s%> Would <S%G2309><s%> Be Comforted, <S%G3870><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> They <S%G3756><s%> Are Not. <S%G1526><s%>

<S%G5053><s%> But Having Died <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Herod, <S%G2264><s%>, Behold, <S%G2400><s%> An Angel <S%G32><s%> Of The Lord <S%G2962><s%> ' In <S%G2596><s%> A Dream <S%G3677><s%> Appears <S%G5316><s%> To <S%G3588><s%> Joseph <S%G2501><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Egypt, <S%G125><s%>

Saying, <S%G3004><s%> Having Risen <S%G1453><s%> Take With Thee <S%G3880><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Little Child <S%G3813><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3384><s%> His Mother, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Go <S%G4198><s%> Into The <S%G1519><s%> Land <S%G1093><s%> Of Israel : <S%G2474><s%> <S%G2348><s%> For They Have Died <S%G1063><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Were Seeking <S%G2212><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Life <S%G5590><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Little Child. <S%G3813><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> And He <S%G1161><s%> Having Risen <S%G1453><s%> Took With Him <S%G3880><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Little Child <S%G3813><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3384><s%> His Mother, <S%G846><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Came <S%G2064><s%> Into The <S%G1519><s%> Land <S%G1093><s%> Of Israel. <S%G2474><s%>

Having Heard <S%G191><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> Archelaus <S%G745><s%> Reigns <S%G936><s%> Over <S%G1909><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Judea <S%G2449><s%> Instead Of <S%G473><s%> Herod <S%G2264><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3962><s%> His Father, <S%G846><s%> He Was Afraid <S%G5399><s%> There <S%G1563><s%> To Go; <S%G565><s%> Having Been Divinely Instructed <S%G5537><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> ' In <S%G2596><s%> A Dream, <S%G3677><s%> He Withdrew <S%G402><s%> Into <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Parts <S%G3313><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Galilee : <S%G1056><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Come <S%G2064><s%> He Dwelt <S%G2730><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> A City <S%G4172><s%> Called <S%G3004><s%> Nazareth; <S%G3478><s%> So That <S%G3704><s%> Should Be Fulfilled <S%G4137><s%> That Which <S%G3588><s%> Was Spoken <S%G4483><s%> By <S%G1223><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Prophets, <S%G4396><s%> That <S%G3754><s%> A Nazarene <S%G3480><s%> Shall He Be Called. <S%G2564><s%>
